QuestData.Title: Spawn of the Twisted Glade
QuestData.Description: The glade to the west has been transformed into a hideous place called the Twisted Glade. Horrible beasts dwell among the trees, stones, and pool of the glade.$B$BI cannot guess where the creatures came from or what horrible forces animate them, but they must be dealt with!$B$BI fear that if they are allowed to dominate the glade, they will poison it beyond redemption. Clear the glade of these creatures who murdered our sisters.
QuestData.LogDescription: Lurielle at the Frozen Glade wants you to kill 10 Thornvine Creepers.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you seen the horrors of the Twisted Glade for yourself?
QuestData.RewardText: You have done well, $n. If we'd had allies like you when the land first began to change, perhaps we might have been able to preserve some of what we've lost.
